summary: This is an email from Judge Nathan's chambers to attorneys Jeff Pa liuca and Laura Mennin er, transmitting a Daubert opinion and order in the case United States v. Maxwell (20cr330). The opinion was issued by Judge Nathan and will be docketed the following day.

events.title: Daubert Opinion Issued
events.description: Judge Nathan issued a Daubert opinion and order in the criminal case United States v. Maxwell (20cr330).

keyFacts: The document is an email transmitting a Daubert opinion and order from Judge Nathan in the case United States v. Maxwell (20cr330).
The opinion was issued on November 11, 2021, and was scheduled to be docketed on November 12, 2021.
The recipients are attorneys Jeff Pa liuca and Laura Mennin er, indicating ongoing legal proceedings in the Maxwell case.
The case reference is 20cr330, which is the docket number for the federal criminal case against Ghislaine Maxwell.
The document shows judicial activity and communication between the court and counsel regarding evidentiary matters (Daubert motion).
